column5: Hi All !If anyone has any advise for fishing the Spanish River in Ontario, I would appreciate the comments. I am going to be there in July and will be going out in to the North Channel. Hoping to generaly fish the river and the Island area of the North Channel.Thanks in advance.Jlware (Ohio)
I haven't fished there, but I did go to Whitefish Falls which isat the far east end of the North Channel...do you want a report on that?
